# SynchronizationEvents.OwnershipChanged

**Structure**

The event raised when ownership of an entity changes.

## Declaration

```swift
struct OwnershipChanged
```

## Getting the involved parties

- **entity**: The entity for which ownership is changed.
- **newOwner**: The new owner of the entity.

## Detecting ownership updates

- **SynchronizationEvents.OwnershipRequest**: The event raised when a network peer wants to gain ownership of an entity.

## Conforms To

- Event
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The entity for which ownership is changed.
items.name: entity

items.description: The new owner of the entity.
items.name: newOwner

items.description: The event raised when a network peer wants to gain ownership of an entity.
